meanings.definition: The part that is left after the subtraction of a number from another.
meanings.sent1: After I ate most of the pizza, only a small remainder was left for my brother.
meanings.sent2: The remainder of the cake was saved for dessert after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The remainder of the puzzle pieces seemed to hide from me, making it harder to complete.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the remainder of the day slipped away like sand through my fingers.
meanings.sent5: The remainder of the paint dried in beautiful swirls on the canvas.

meanings.sent1: After the event, only a small remainder of guests lingered to chat.
meanings.sent2: The remainder of the books on the shelf caught her eye as she browsed.
meanings.sent3: The remainder of the cookies in the jar mysteriously disappeared overnight.
meanings.sent4: In the empty classroom, the remainder of the students whispered excitedly.
meanings.sent5: The remainder of the stars twinkled brightly in the night sky.
